description: This PROVON caregiver kit includes: PROVON Antimicrobial Lotion Soap, a medicated hand cleanser with 0.3% chloroxylenol (PCMX) which combines effective broad-spectrum antimicrobial activity with conditioners to be gentle on hands while it cleans; PROVON Shampoo & Body Wash offers a rejuvenating getaway with a fresh, clean fragrance reminiscent of spring. Enriched with aloe and vitamin E with low foam for easy rinsing, the exceptionally mild formula won't irritate the eyes; PROVON Hand & Body Lotion is a water-based, deep conditioning moisturizer has been specially formulated to condition dry, irritated skin. It rubs in quickly and aids in preventing skin from drying and cracking. The non-greasy formulation is scent-free and suitable for use by caregivers, patients and staff; PROVON Perineal Skin Protectant is an opaque, non-greasy, water-resistant ointment with petrolatum and Vitamin E is easy to apply and remove. It provides good coverage for an effective temporary barrier to urine and fecal matter while protecting delicate, irritated skin from chafing. Helps maintain the natural skin barrier and helps prevent skin breakdown; PROVON Perineal Wash is specially formulated for delicate skin, this cleanser rapidly removes urine and feces, ensuring gentle and thorough cleansing and reducing the risk of skin irritation and breakdown. Contains aloe and vitamin E with a- fresh herbal fragrance. description:
A healthy classroom is a place where students can learn and grow. Good hand hygiene plays an important role in keeping students healthy and productive. Whether it's after recess, before mealtimes, on field trips, or throughout cold and flu season, using PURELL products is a great way to help promote health and well-being throughout your school. Includes: (1) 18 oz. foam pump bottle of PURELL Advanced Hand Sanitizer, (2) 40 count canisters of PURELL Hand Sanitizing Wipes and (1) PURELL ES Everywhere System easy to mount dispenser. Bottles of PURELL Advanced Hand Sanitizer in Refreshing Aloe, (1) 1 ounce PURELL Refreshing Gel JELLY WRAP Carrier, (2) 1 ounce PURELL Refreshing Aloe JELLY WRAP Carriers, (1) 1 ounce PURELL Advanced Hand Sanitizer Ocean Kiss in JELLY WRAP Carrier.

description: GOJO 1912-D1 2 Piece LTX Antibacterial foam hand wash refill dispenser kit includes the GOJO 1919-04 LTX-12 electronic touch-free dispenser and two 1200 mL refill bottles of GOJO 1912-02 Antibacterial Plum Foam Hand wash. The brushed chrome and black electronic dispenser reduces the risk of pathogen transmission by eliminating a shared touch surface and requires no batteries for operation. The dispenser controls portions dispensed to help reduce waste, has a clear window on the front to show the fill level, and can be locked to help improve security. It has a compact size to accommodate installation in smaller spaces. The dispenser accepts 1200 mL refills of foam designed for GOJO LTX-12 dispensers.
title: GOJO Starter Kit, 1200 ml Capacity, Chrome/Black

bullets: Electronic touch-free hand wash dispenser reduces the risk of pathogen transmission by eliminating a shared touch surface

Electronic dispenser controls portions dispensed to help reduce waste and it has a clear window on its front and a skylight on its top to monitor the fill level
Hand wash contains 0.3% triclosan to help reduce the number of germs on hands and has extract of plum and skin conditioners to help keep skin moisturized
